author: wn.com
title: Lord O’Donnell: Former Civil Service head says Government policy should be shaped by human feelings ...
text: Government policy should be informed and shaped by the most important human feelings, rather than by boosting the country’s GDP , according to the former head of the Civil Service . Lord O’Donnell , Cabinet Secretary to three prime ministers,
